languages.text: Висирь Кровавой паутины приглашает Вольного Торговца посетить храм культа, что сокрыт в недрах флагмана. Но вход в сакральную колыбель смерти сможет найти лишь тот, кто пройдет стезей святой Эрианы, Матери-паучихи культа смерти.

The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.
languages.original_text: Висирь Кровавой паутины приглашает Вольного Торговца посетить храм культа, что сокрыт в недрах флагмана. Но вход в сакральную колыбель смерти сможет найти лишь тот, кто пройдет стезей святой Эрианы, Матери-паучихи культа смерти.

traits.locale_text: The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple that lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked the road of Saint Erianne, Founder of the Weave.

The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple that lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked the road of Saint Erianne, Founder of the Weave.

The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

languages.text: Le vizir de la Toile de Sang a invité {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à visiter le temple du culte, qui se trouve quelque part dans les entrailles du vaisseau. Cependant, le berceau sacré de la mort ne se révélera qu'à ceux qui ont marché sur les traces de Sainte Erianne, l'araignée matriarche.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

traits.locale_text: Le vizir de la Toile de Sang a invité {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à visiter le temple du culte, qui se trouve quelque part dans les entrailles du vaisseau. Cependant, le berceau sacré de la mort ne se révélera qu'à ceux qui ont marché sur les traces de Sainte Erianne, l'araignée matriarche.

languages.text: El Visir de la Red Sanguinolenta ha invitado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a que visite el templo del culto, situado en las entrañas de la nave del vacío. Sin embargo, el sagrado santuario de la muerte solo se revelará a quien siga los pasos de santa Erianne, la Araña Matriarca.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

traits.locale_text: El Visir de la Red Sanguinolenta ha invitado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a que visite el templo del culto, situado en las entrañas de la nave del vacío. Sin embargo, el sagrado santuario de la muerte solo se revelará a quien siga los pasos de santa Erianne, la Araña Matriarca.

languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブのヴィジールは、ヴォイドシップの奥深くにある教団の神殿に来て欲しいとローグトレーダーに持ちかけた。しかし、神聖な死の揺りかごは、蜘蛛の師母である聖エリアンヌの足跡を辿る者にしかその姿を現さない。
languages.original_text: The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブのヴィジールは、ヴォイドシップの奥深くにある教団の神殿に来て欲しいとローグトレーダーに持ちかけた。しかし、神聖な死の揺りかごは、蜘蛛の師母である聖エリアンヌの足跡を辿る者にしかその姿を現さない。

languages.text: 织血罗网的宿老邀请行商浪人参观教派的圣殿，圣殿位于虚空舰深处的某个地方。然而，只有追随最初的织网者“圣埃兰妮”留下的足迹，才有资格前往神圣的死亡摇篮。
languages.original_text: The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

traits.locale_text: 织血罗网的宿老邀请行商浪人参观教派的圣殿，圣殿位于虚空舰深处的某个地方。然而，只有追随最初的织网者“圣埃兰妮”留下的足迹，才有资格前往神圣的死亡摇篮。

languages.text: Der Wesir des Blutgesponnenen Netzes hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} eingeladen, den Tempel des Kults zu besuchen, der sich irgendwo in den Tiefen des Raumschiffs befindet. Doch diese heilige Wiege des Todes offenbart sich nur jenen, die den Schritten der heiligen Erianne folgen, der Matriarchenspinne.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.

traits.locale_text: Der Wesir des Blutgesponnenen Netzes hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} eingeladen, den Tempel des Kults zu besuchen, der sich irgendwo in den Tiefen des Raumschiffs befindet. Doch diese heilige Wiege des Todes offenbart sich nur jenen, die den Schritten der heiligen Erianne folgen, der Matriarchenspinne.

languages.text: Kanipi Ağı Veziri, Hür Tacir'i uçsuz gemisinin derinliklerinde bir yerde bulunan tarikat tapınağını ziyaret etmesi için davet etti. Ancak ölümün kutsal beşiği kendisini, yalnızca Örümcek Kraliçe Azize Erianne'in adımlarını takip edenlere açık eder.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web has invited the Rogue Trader to visit the cult's temple, which lies somewhere in the depths of the voidship. However, the hallowed cradle of death will only reveal itself to one who has walked in the footsteps of Saint Erianne, the Matriarch Spider.
